  • Python 2.7 Retires Today

Python 2.7 will not be maintained past Jan 1st, 2020. So long Python 2, and thank you for your years of faithful service. Python 3, your time is now!

â€œThe Zen of Python is not â€˜the rules of Pythonâ€™ or â€˜guidelines of Pythonâ€™. It is full of contradiction and allusion. It is not intended to be followed: it is intended to be meditated upon. In this spirit, I offer this series of meditations on the Zen of Python.â€

åªæ˜¯èƒ½å°†:

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -i overlay.png -filter_complex "[0]trim=start_frame=10:end_frame=20[v0];\

import ffmpeg

in_file = ffmpeg.input('input.mp4')
overlay_file = ffmpeg.input('overlay.png')
(
    ffmpeg
    .concat(
        in_file.trim(start_frame=10, end_frame=20),
        in_file.trim(start_frame=30, end_frame=40),
    )
    .overlay(overlay_file.hflip())
    .drawbox(50, 50, 120, 120, color='red', thickness=5)
    .output('out.mp4')
    .run()
)
